dict.acceptation: <律>上述的；少说为妙；（做）某事有/没有很多优点（或好处）：某事物有/没有多少可说的；说到底；
说，讲（ say的过去式和过去分词 ）；表明；念；说明；

sent.orig: Even four horses cannot take back what one has said.; What has been said cannot be unsaid.
I have said all there is to be said about it.
sent.trans: 关于这件事，该说的我都说了。

sent.orig: She said nothing but sat there staring blankly.; She said nothing but sat there as if in a trance.
sent.trans: 她话也不说，坐在那里发呆。

sent.orig: What he said should not be taken lightly.; What he has said carries a lot of weight.
What he said was self-contradictory.; What he said didn't hang together.
